', " Ergonomic Hip Sling Carrier: Made from breathable cotton fabric, this baby-carrying backpack evenly distributes the baby's weight on the mom's shoulders, waist, and back, reducing pressure and preventing spinal injuries. Parent and baby can both remain active and snuggle securely in this ergonomic design, while also being hands-free to do other things.  ", ' 6 IN 1 Baby Carrying Belt: You can use this baby carrier bag in six different ways to carry your baby. You can change the ways you hold the baby according to your own needs. When the baby grows up, carrying him in the convertible hip seat baby carrier will allow him to interact with others around him while enjoying exploring the world.  ', ' SAFE & SECURE: To prevent swaying while travelling, this carrier is wrapped beautifully, comes with a firm, and durable buckle, and can support up to 20kg of baby’s weight. The baby convertible hip seat carrier is super safe to use and trusted by many Indian parents.  ', ' STRONG DETACHABLE SEAT: The hip seat can be removed from the carrier and is sturdy enough to keep your baby\'s hip and legs in the proper "M\' position for the safe development of their bodies. On the hip seat are small silicone dots that keep your baby from falling off and make it more comfortable.  ']

featureBullets: [" Suitable for 4 Plus Month Babies: Infantso's hip seat baby carrier is specially designed to cater to the needs of babies aged 4 months and above. ", " Easy to Use with Proper Support: Designed with both parents and babies in mind, the Infantso's hip seat baby carrier offers ease of use and proper support. It provides essential support for the baby's head, neck, spine, and hips, promoting healthy development and preventing undue strain. With intuitive adjustments and ergonomic features, parents can quickly and securely position their baby in the carrier, giving them peace of mind and allowing for comfortable and extended wear.  ", " 4-Way Adjustable Carrying Position: Offering versatility and flexibility, the hip seat baby carrier boasts a 4-way adjustable carrying position. This feature allows parents to choose the most natural and comfortable sitting position for their baby, ensuring that the baby's buttocks and thighs are adequately supported to avoid unnecessary pressure. Whether it's an inward-facing cuddle or a relaxed horizontal feeding position, parents have the freedom to carry their baby in the most suitable way.  ", " Multi-Positional Versatility: Infantso's hip seat baby carrier provides multi-positional versatility, catering to various carrying preferences and situations. Parents can effortlessly switch between facing-in, facing-out, backpack, and horizontal feeding positions, adapting to the baby's mood and needs throughout the day. This versatility allows for bonding moments, exploration, and convenient feeding sessions, making it a practical and indispensable accessory for modern parents.  ", " Smartly Designed for Style & Comfort: The hip seat baby carrier from Infantso is smartly designed to meet the demands of today's parents.
